TEXT.TITLE: FORD <F> EXTENDS BUYER INCENTIVE PROGRAM
TEXT.BODY: Ford Motor Co said it has extended to April 30 its buyer incentive program on 1986 and 1987 Ford Escort and Tempo, and Mercury Lynx and Topaz. Consumers will have a choice of 3.9 pct to 9.9 pct annual percentage rate financing or a cash rebate of up to 600 dlrs. Earlier Ford extended its incentive program to April 30 on its Taurus and Mercury Sable and several lines of light trucks. Reuter
